TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlWriter extends System.Object
public ref class XamlWriter abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一个静态（多次重载） 方法，该方法可用于有限的 XAML 序列化的 XAML 标记提供运行时对象。

span.span: Provides a single static method (multiple overloads) that can be used for limited XAML serialization of provided run-time objects into XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化是显式运行，并且不能访问到可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. 这包括从 Xbap。This includes from XBAPs. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化为为字符串，并使用类。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 字符串然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]

summary.span: 直接或通过指定的对象序列化为的中间对象返回 XAML。

span.span: Returns XAML either directly or through an object intermediary that serializes the specified object.

.method public static hidebysig string Save(object obj) cil managed
Public Shared Function Save (obj As Object) As String
public: static System::String ^ Save(System::Object ^ obj);
static member Save : obj -> string

param.name: obj

span.span: The element to be serialized.

param.span: 通常情况下，这是页面或应用程序的根元素。

span.span: Typically, this is the root element of a page or application.

summary.span: 返回序列化指定的对象和其属性的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: Returns a XAML string that serializes the specified object and its properties.

returns.span: 一个可以写入到流或文件的 XAML 字符串。

span.span: A XAML string that can be written to a stream or file.

returns.span: 属于所提供的所有元素的逻辑树将序列化元素。

span.span: The logical tree of all elements that fall under the provided element will be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化是显式运行，并且不能访问到可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化为为字符串，并使用类。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 字符串然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]

summary.span: XAML 将信息保存到指定的流以序列化指定的对象及其属性。

span.span: Saves XAML information into a specified stream to serialize the specified object and its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此方法的序列化具有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 这是因为启用的序列化是显式运行，并且不能访问到可能的设计时信息在原始 XAML （如果有）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 有关详细信息，请参阅[序列化限制的 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 调用不允许在部分信任环境中运行时。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化为成使用类。The following example serializes a into a using the class. 流然后反序列化回使用静态方法类。The stream is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class. [!code-csharp[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)] [!code-vb[XamlReaderWriterSnippets#XamlReaderLoadXmlReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XamlReaderWriterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#xamlreaderloadxmlreader)]
